ygData.subject: Re: An idea for the slow day
ygData.msgSnippet: I just want to duelweild nunchucks (sp?)
ygData.messageBody:
I just want to duelweild nunchucks (sp?)


On Fri, 27 Aug 1999, Ronnie wrote:

> From: "Ronnie" <ronnien@...>
>
> A monk only weapon, now before someone say but out fists are our weapons
> listen for a sec. Wouldn't it be cool if there were magic gloves with
> effects? I personally would love to wield a pair of gloves that cast an
> effect, like life tap or shock of frost. There are just not enough Monk
> only stuff out there, other then the PoF stuff and the sashes and head bands
> I think this would be a nice addition, maybe along with a nifty looking robe
> for monks.
>
> Palerose Darkthron ~24 circle monk of the Ashen order~ (Tunare server)
>
